show.title: Boozing & Bonding
show.description: Two friends (Keegan and Chris) rewatch every James Bond film and pair it with a delectable alcoholic beverage themed around the film they're watching. They watch the movie, drink, and then things get sloppy.
show.copyright: © 2019 Boozing & Bonding. Part of the Station Zed Empire.

episodes.title: Book Club 003 – Casino Royale (Novel)
episodes.summary: We go back to the start of the primordial ooze from which the entire James Bond franchise springs forth from. And what an ooze it is! Not only do we discuss the original Casino Royale novel, but we also talk about Ian Flemming and his issues, which bleed
episodes.keywords: Book Club,BoozeBondPod,Casino Royale,Chris Nyarady,Ian Flemming,James Bond,James Bond 007,Keegan Flick-Parker,Le Chiffre,Vesper Lynd,Vesper Martini
episodes.content:
We go back to the start of the primordial ooze from which the entire James Bond franchise springs forth from. And what an ooze it is! Not only do we discuss the original Casino Royale novel, but we also talk about Ian Flemming and his issues, which bleeds into the issues we have with Bond’s premiere. Spoiler alert: we find it rough. How rough?? We felt the need for a special trigger warning for this one. That’s how rough.

Trigger Warning: a more in-depth discussion about misogyny, violence against women and sexual assault than our usual episodes.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

episodes.title: Book Club 002 – Eidolon
episodes.summary:
We return to the world of Dynamite Comics’ ultra violent James Bond for its second story arc: Eidolon. Do we enjoy this more than the previous Bond comic outing, or does it not stand a GHOST of a chance? Listen to find out!
—
Hosted by Chris Nyarad
episodes.keywords: Book Club,BoozeBondPod,Boozing & Bonding,Dynamite Comics,Eidolon,James Bond,James Bond 007,Jason Masters,VARGR,Warren Ellis
episodes.content:

episodes.title: Book Club 001 – VARGR
episodes.summary: In our first Boozing & Bonding Book Club special, we take a look at the first James Bond comic book arc produced by Dynamite Comics: VARGR. Do we have a bloody good time or a bloody bad time? Either way, it’s very bloody.
episodes.keywords: Book Club,BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,Chris Nyarady,Comic book,Dynamite Comics,Ian Flemming,James Bond,James Bond 007,Jason Masters,Keegan Flick-Parker,VARGR,Warren Ellis
episodes.content: In our first Boozing & Bonding Book Club special, we take a look at the first James Bond comic book arc produced by Dynamite Comics: VARGR. Do we have a bloody good time or a bloody bad time? Either way, it’s very bloody.

episodes.title: S-Branch 008 – Sean Conplicated
episodes.summary:
With the news of the passing of Sean Connery, we take a moment to look back at the troubled life, and career of the legendary Bond actor. Plus, we head back to Las Vegas to bring you bonus content from our Diamond Are Forever episode.
—
Hosted by Chris N

episodes.title: S-Branch 007 – Making Time for No Time to Die
episodes.summary: With the news that No Time to Die has been delayed (for the second time) Keegan and Chris take a moment to actually talk about their thoughts on Daniel Craig’s overdue upcoming Bond finale, as well as it’s troubling journey to actually be sho
episodes.keywords: Billie Eilish,BoozeBondPod,Daniel Craig,Games,James Bond,James Bond 007,Mad Libs,No Time to Die
episodes.content:
With the news that No Time to Die has been delayed (for the second time) Keegan and Chris take a moment to actually talk about their thoughts on Daniel Craig’s overdue upcoming Bond finale, as well as it’s troubling journey to actually be shown to the public during a global pandemic. As if that topic isn’t fun enough, we also play 2 Bond-themed games: a return to Mad-Libs and a horrible Bond movie review quiz!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

episodes.title: 0013 – Octopussy
episodes.summary: At long last, we return to the world on James Bond! And boy are we cranky, boarding on nihilistic, as we watch “Octopussy” (1983). How can the Boozing & Bonding Boys get mad at a film where James Bond dresses as a clown, gorilla, crocodil
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Boozing & Bonding,Boozing and Bonding,Chai Martini,Elephants,James Bond,James Bond 007,Maud Adams,Octopussy,Roger Moore,Sons of Vancouver
episodes.content:
At long last, we return to the world on James Bond! And boy are we cranky, boarding on nihilistic, as we watch “Octopussy” (1983). How can the Boozing & Bonding Boys get mad at a film where James Bond dresses as a clown, gorilla, crocodile, and a horse’s ass?! Grab yourself a Chai Martini, touch some Fabergé eggs, and join us to find out! #ElephantsNeverForget

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com
Drinks sponsored by Sons of Vancouver Distillery (Check them out at https://sonsofvancouver.ca/)

episodes.title: S-Branch 006 – Oops! All Games
episodes.summary: Let’s just have fun, you guys!! In this episode, Keegan and Chris just wind back playin’ some games with the vague reoccurring theme of James Bond tying it all together. First, we play a round of Mad Libs with fan-submitted suggestions, and t
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,fan fiction,Games,James Bond,James Bond 007,Mad Libs,S Branch,spy,spy games
episodes.content:
Let’s just have fun, you guys!! In this episode, Keegan and Chris just wind back playin’ some games with the vague reoccurring theme of James Bond tying it all together. First, we play a round of Mad Libs with fan-submitted suggestions, and then things get wild as we let an AI-complete James Bond fan fiction with us. Things get wild, y’all.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

episodes.title: S-Branch 005 – Second Chances (Brought to you by WikiFeet)
episodes.summary: Keegan and Chris return to talk about what James Bond films we’d like to be seen in a remake or reboot. Then we head back to Japan for cut content from You Only Live Twice, where foot fetishes are mentioned a lot. Chris is as confused as you are.
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,feet,James Bond,James Bond 007,Sake,SBranch,Sean Connery,wikifeet,You Only Live Twice

episodes.title: S-Branch 004 – You Only Live and Let Die Twice (ft. Lindsay Braynen)
episodes.summary: We’re joined by our first ever guest and friend of the show Lindsay Braynen (heymagicalgirl.com) as we dive in-depth back into the crocodile-infested waters of Live and Let Die to talk about the representation of Voodoo and black culture in this fi
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,Chris Nyarady,Ian Flemming,James Bond,James Bond 007,Keegan Flick-Parker,Lindsay Braynen,Live and Let DIe,Roger Moore,Voodoo
episodes.content: We’re joined by our first ever guest and friend of the show Lindsay Braynen (heymagicalgirl.com) as we dive in-depth back into the crocodile-infested waters of Live and Let Die to talk about the representation of Voodoo and black culture in this film, and so much more! We also play a game of mad-libs (unrelated.)

episodes.title: S-Branch 003 – We Jumped the Shark
episodes.summary: In our return to S-Branch, Keegan and Chris pitch hypothetical actors they’d want to see in the future of the Bond franchise. Some are jokes, some are serious, most of them are jumping the shark. Speaking of sharks, we return to our shark-filled ep
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,James Bond,James Bond 007,Sean Connery,Thunderball
episodes.content: In our return to S-Branch, Keegan and Chris pitch hypothetical actors they’d want to see in the future of the Bond franchise. Some are jokes, some are serious, most of them are jumping the shark. Speaking of sharks, we return to our shark-filled episode of Thunderball for more bonus content!

episodes.title: S-Branch 002 – Santa Bond
episodes.summary: It’s the long-delayed return of our sober sister podcast: S-Branch! Speaking of long-delayed, Chris gives Keegan an out of season Christmas gift, and we revisit cut content from our Goldfinger episode.
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Christmas,Goldfinger,Ian Flemming,James Bond,Shaken
episodes.content: It’s the long-delayed return of our sober sister podcast: S-Branch! Speaking of long-delayed, Chris gives Keegan an out of season Christmas gift, and we revisit cut content from our Goldfinger episode.

episodes.title: 0012 – For Your Eyes Only
episodes.summary: While enjoying some warm glühwein (mulled wine) the Boozing & Bonding Boys make a startling discovery: it’s harder to pay attention to serious movies when you’re drunk. Listen as they struggle to recall the plot of the (comparatively) gro
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Boozing & Bonding,Chris Nyarady,For Your Eyes Only,glühwein,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,Mulled wine,Roger Moore
episodes.content:
While enjoying some warm glühwein (mulled wine) the Boozing & Bonding Boys make a startling discovery: it’s harder to pay attention to serious movies when you’re drunk. Listen as they struggle to recall the plot of the (comparatively) grounded Bond film “For Your Eyes Only” (1981). Enjoy the good, the bad, and the uncomfortable in this retrospective Bond outing, that looks back on the past and paves the way for the rest of Bond’s films to come.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 0011 – Moonraker
episodes.summary: Pack your bags folks! It’s time to blast off with Roger Moore’s 1979 Bond film Moonraker!! So grab your Tang and vodka, and get Astro-drunk with Keegan and Chris as they navigate the most cartoony of Bond’s outings. It’s a film wh
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,Moonraker,Podcast,Roger Moore,Screwdriver,Tang
episodes.content:
Pack your bags folks! It’s time to blast off with Roger Moore’s 1979 Bond film Moonraker!! So grab your Tang and vodka, and get Astro-drunk with Keegan and Chris as they navigate the most cartoony of Bond’s outings. It’s a film where laser fights fit right in with a hovercraft gondola, a double-taking pigeon, and the most farfetched thing, love at first sight. Also, Jaws is back! Yay!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 0010 – The Spy Who Loved Me
episodes.summary: Return with Roger Moore’s James Bond (or Mr Bund as some know him) for his 1977 film: The Spy Who Loved Me. A film where things seem familiar… maybe too familiar. Sharks, nukes, and Russians? Check, check and check! Join Keegan and Chris as t
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,James Bond,Moscow Mule,Podcast,Roger Moore,spy,The Spy Who Loved Me
episodes.content:
Return with Roger Moore’s James Bond (or Mr Bund as some know him) for his 1977 film: The Spy Who Loved Me. A film where things seem familiar… maybe too familiar. Sharks, nukes, and Russians? Check, check and check! Join Keegan and Chris as they get tipsy on Moscow mules and become a pair of rude, rude boys this episode. Also, Jaws might be a vampire! Find out why by listening to the episode! *CHOMP*

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 009 – The Man with the Golden Gun
episodes.summary: Roger Moore returns, and his Bond is at peak asshole in the 1974 film The Man with the Golden Gun! Listen as we gush about Christopher Lee, be charmed by Nick Nack, be confused about the film’s Asian representation, and rage over a poorly placed sl
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Boozing & Bonding,Christopher Lee,Golden Gun,James Bond,Podcast,Roger Moore,The Man with the Golden Gun
episodes.content:
Roger Moore returns, and his Bond is at peak asshole in the 1974 film The Man with the Golden Gun! Listen as we gush about Christopher Lee, be charmed by Nick Nack, be confused about the film’s Asian representation, and rage over a poorly placed slide whistle. A couple of tropical “Golden Gun” cocktails help us take both good and the bad, so join us for the ups and downs of this perfectly serviceable film.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 008 – Live and Let Die
episodes.summary: We’re back with season 2: The Roger Moore Era!! Keegan and Chris head down to New Orleans, sippin’ sazeracs, and watching the funky fresh (and a bit funky stale) 1973 film Live and Let Die. Enjoy crocodiles, massive boat chases, a kick-ass th
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,cocktail,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,Live and Let DIe,New Orleans,Roger Moore,Sazerac
episodes.content:
We’re back with season 2: The Roger Moore Era!! Keegan and Chris head down to New Orleans, sippin’ sazeracs, and watching the funky fresh (and a bit funky stale) 1973 film Live and Let Die. Enjoy crocodiles, massive boat chases, a kick-ass theme song, and problematic depictions of black characters and culture. This film has it all!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: The Bondies (Season 1 Finale)
episodes.summary: For the final episode of our first season, we do something a little different. We make an award show!! It’s the perfect way to look back at all the films, and drinks we’ve enjoyed so far. We decide the victors in numerous categories, along wi
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,James Bond
episodes.content:
For the final episode of our first season, we do something a little different. We make an award show!! It’s the perfect way to look back at all the films, and drinks we’ve enjoyed so far. We decide the victors in numerous categories, along with some help from our listeners. All while “enjoying” classic vodka martinis (and a bunch of olives.)

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

episodes.summary:
In our first episode of S-Branch (the sober sister podcasts to Boozing & Bonding), Chris has some lingering thoughts about Goldfinger, and the boys actually finally make rules for their James Bond drinking game.
Also, vote for who you want to win in

episodes.content:
In our first episode of S-Branch (the sober sister podcasts to Boozing & Bonding), Chris has some lingering thoughts about Goldfinger, and the boys actually finally make rules for their James Bond drinking game.

Also, vote for who you want to win in our season 1 award show episode: The Bondies
www.boozingandbonding.com/bondies-survey.html

Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker

episodes.title: 007 – Diamonds Are Forever
episodes.summary: Time to play a little game called “where are the frickin’ diamonds?!” We bid farewell to Sean Connery in perhaps the most polarizing film we’ve explored yet: the silly Las Vagas romp known as Diamonds Are Forever. And we cheer Sea
episodes.keywords: Black Velvet,BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,Diamonds Are Forever,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,Sean Connery
episodes.content:
Time to play a little game called “where are the frickin’ diamonds?!” We bid farewell to Sean Connery in perhaps the most polarizing film we’ve explored yet: the silly Las Vagas romp known as Diamonds Are Forever. And we cheer Sean Connery’s goodbye from the show with a Black Velvet cocktail.

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)
Website: www.boozingandbonding.com

episodes.title: 006 (Part 2) – On Her Majesty’s Secret Service
episodes.summary: George Lazenby might be a one-and-done Bond, but we’re not done talking about this movie! It’s the exciting conclusion to our 2 part “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” epic! What did we think about this all-new, all-different
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,George Lazenby,James Bond,MooMan,On Her Majesty's Secret Service,Tim Tam,Tim Tam Slam
episodes.content:
George Lazenby might be a one-and-done Bond, but we’re not done talking about this movie! It’s the exciting conclusion to our 2 part “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” epic! What did we think about this all-new, all-different Bond movie? And about the film’s controversial ending? We slam back another Tim Tam Slam and talk all about it!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 006 (Part 1) – On Her Majesty’s Secret Service
episodes.summary: George Lazenby takes over the role of Bond, and we have so much to talk about! So much in fact, that this is our first two-part episode! So join us in part 1 of our discussion of “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” where we disagree on th
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,George Lazenby,James Bond,Keegan Flick-P,Keegan Flick-Parker,On Her Majesty's Secret Service,Tim Tam Slam,Tim Tim
episodes.content:
George Lazenby takes over the role of Bond, and we have so much to talk about! So much in fact, that this is our first two-part episode! So join us in part 1 of our discussion of “On Her Majesty’s Secret Service” where we disagree on the film’s music, agree on how awesome the Bond girl Tracy is, and we cozy up with some boozy hot chocolates and coffees as Keegan teaches Chris the finer points of a Tim Tam Slam.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 005 – You Only Live Twice
episodes.summary: We share some sake and journey to the land of the rising sun for the mixed-bag Bond film known as You Only Live Twice. Take joy in a tiny helicopter, cringe at outdated stereotypes, cheer for The Rock’s grandfather, be confused at the choice of try
episodes.keywords: 007,Blofeld,BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,MooMan,Sake,Sean Connery,YOLT,You Only Live Twice
episodes.content:
We share some sake and journey to the land of the rising sun for the mixed-bag Bond film known as You Only Live Twice. Take joy in a tiny helicopter, cringe at outdated stereotypes, cheer for The Rock’s grandfather, be confused at the choice of trying to make Sean Connery look like a Japanese man. This episode has it all!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 004 – Thunderball
episodes.summary: We jump into some familiar waters as we watch Thunderball and drink the rum-based cocktail known as “Sharkbite.” The movie recap gets incredibly sloppy as our drunken ramblings find it difficult to separate this film from Never Say Never Agai
episodes.keywords: 007,BoozeBondPod,Chris Nyarady,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,Rum,Sailor Jerry Rum,Sean Connery,Shark,Sharkbite,Thunderball
episodes.content:
We jump into some familiar waters as we watch Thunderball and drink the rum-based cocktail known as “Sharkbite.” The movie recap gets incredibly sloppy as our drunken ramblings find it difficult to separate this film from Never Say Never Again, and we pitch some new James Bond spin-off movies. 4 episodes in, and we’re already jumping the shark?? Join us to find out!

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 003 – Goldfinger
episodes.summary: We sip on mint juleps as we watch Goldfinger. In this episode Goldfinger talks about how much he loves gold, Chris talks about how much he loves Oddjob, we all giggle at Pussy Galore’s name, and Keegan pitches some better, slightly less sexist one-
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,Goldfinger,James Bond,Oddjob,Pussy Galore
episodes.content:
We sip on mint juleps as we watch Goldfinger. In this episode Goldfinger talks about how much he loves gold, Chris talks about how much he loves Oddjob, we all giggle at Pussy Galore’s name, and Keegan pitches some better, slightly less sexist one-liners for Bond. Join us for one of our favorite Bond films paired with (so far) our least favorite drink.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 002 – From Russia With Love
episodes.summary: Our second outing with Sean Connery as Bond leads to a surprisingly emotional journey and the first #TrainFight of many to come. Join us as we watch what many folks say is their favorite Bond film, From Russia With Love, while we drink the most obvious d
episodes.keywords: BoozeBondPod,Boozing and Bonding,Chris Nyarady,From Russia With Love,James Bond,Keegan Flick-Parker,MooMan,TrainFight,TrainFights
episodes.content:
Our second outing with Sean Connery as Bond leads to a surprisingly emotional journey and the first #TrainFight of many to come. Join us as we watch what many folks say is their favorite Bond film, From Russia With Love, while we drink the most obvious drink we could pair with this movie: White Russians.

—

Hosted by Chris Nyarady and Keegan Flick-Parker
Edited by Chris Nyarady
Logo by Keegan Flick-Parker
Boozing & Bonding Theme by MissingNo (Check them out at missingnoband.bandcamp.com)

episodes.title: 001 – Dr. No
episodes.summary:
We go back to where it all started with the first James Bond film, Dr. No, while enjoying a delicious mango rum cocktail. Oh ya, and there’s also a dragon. That’s in there too.
All this and more on Boozing & Bonding!
—
